structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Enforcement Of Secs. 249 A To 249 E1/2
law.text: The department of public health, local boards of health, the director of standards and local sealers of weights and measures shall cause sections two hundred and forty-nine A to two hundred and forty-nine E1/2, inclusive, to be enforced.
